full_summary:
**Utility Pole Tender Announcement: Red Pine Peeled Utility Poles Class 4 (W2037-240050)**
==============================================

#### Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking a contractor to provide and deliver 50 untreated 35-foot Class 4, Red Pine Peeled utility poles. The option to purchase an additional 50 poles per year for the next two years is also available.

#### Tender Details

* **Tender Reference Number**: W2037-240050
* **Amendment Number**: 5
* **Publication Date**: September 18, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: October 24, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: November 1, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: May 31, 2026
* **Procurement Category**: Goods (GD)
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

#### Eligibility and Trades Agreements

This tender is open to contractors who have a goods and services tax (GST) number. The contract is also subject to the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement and other applicable trade agreements.

#### Regions of Delivery and Opportunity

This tender is limited to contractors who are able to deliver the utility poles to Ontario (except the National Capital Region).

#### Tender Submission and Requirements

All tender submissions must be made through Ariba Discovery, with the following documentation attached:

* Bid security (blanket bond or cash deposit)
* Proof of vendor status
* Copy of GST registration

Please disregard any deadlines previously posted on the Ariba Discovery platform or through Buyandsell. Only bids submitted by October 24, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT will be considered.

#### Point of Contact

Sabrina Cheng (SPAC/PSPC)

Email: [sabrina.cheng@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:sabrina.cheng@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
Phone: None

The tender notice can be accessed through the following URL: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17480189?extsite=MTc0ODAxODlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17480189?extsite=MTc0ODAx
